attributes.action: All AI generated media (videos, photos & audio) to be marked as such.
attributes.additional_details:
We find ourselves in a digital world, where the truth has the potential to lose almost all meaning. 

Children and adults alike do not know what to believe as they watch videos, see pictures and read articles shaping their reality.  

The narratives being written within social media, the news an all types of media, is now subject to a type of manipulation never witnessed before.  This manipulation is on a scale never witnessed before and with repercussions more severe than ever before.
attributes.background: The UK government must pass a law requiring any website displaying media influenced wholly, or partly, by artificial intelligence, to state so immediately on the media being displayed.   An example of this being; a Watermark top left of all media, such as “AIM” Artificial Intelligence Manipulated.

rejection.details:
The following petition calls for a similar action: 

Require generative AI watermarks & ban using people’s likeness without consent
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/736690
